quest.name: Herbicidal Tendencies
journal:
 Quest Sync
Charmont's eyes have a faraway look about them, as if he is thinking great thoughts.
objectives: Wait at the specified location, use the herbicidal tincture on the massive berkanan, then slay it.

dialogue.name: CHARMONT
dialogue.text: What luck! You are just the gallant sort I was in search of.

dialogue.name: CHARMONT
dialogue.text: You see, I've whipped up an experimental new tincture, one that brings low a certain type of fiend. I had hoped a brave adventurer might test its efficacy for me in the field.

dialogue.name: CHARMONT
dialogue.text: And since you're here, perhaps you could fill that role? Good. Now then, about this solution of mine! With the help of some gleaners, I've crafted a concoction that can intenerate even the hardest of seedkin's casings, allowing one to make quick work of the beasts.

dialogue.name: CHARMONT
dialogue.text: Or so my hypothesis goes, anyway. Alas, my genius remains untested and thus unproven─which is where you come in. One so well versed in the ways of war should have no trouble at all verifying the tincture's efficacy, I should think.

dialogue.name: CHARMONT
dialogue.text: Based on the information I have ascertained, an oversized berkanan can be found wandering about to the west of Logistikon Beta. Douse that sadistic seedkin in my newest nostrum and bash it into a bloody pulp for me, would you?

dialogue.name: CHARMONT
dialogue.text: What wonders I'm capable of confecting. Well, I suppose we don't know as of yet whether this particular experiment of mine is a wonder...though I can hardly imagine it is anything but!

dialogue.name: CHARMONT
dialogue.text: Why, not a scratch on you. I take this to mean my serum did its job, then?

dialogue.name: CHARMONT
dialogue.text: Is that so? Goodness, my genius is rather startling, isn't it? That was a tincture most hastily thrown together─nary a thought was put into it.

dialogue.name: CHARMONT
dialogue.text: What? This is most disappointing. You have rendered this whole exercise utterly meaningless. Still, it is impressive that you were able to bring the beast to its bark-covered knees when so many others have failed before you.

dialogue.name: CHARMONT
dialogue.text: At any rate, I thank you for services rendered. Here, for your troubles. Well then, I must return to my pondering─these theories of mine won't hypothesize themselves!
